about_the_game:
Broken War is an intense first-person shooter that combines various multiplayer modes. The game takes place in a post-apocalyptic world where factions fight for supremacy in the devastating landscapes after a global catastrophe. Broken War offers a variety of game modes designed to test both individual skills and teamwork.

Main features:

Multiplayer Mayhem: Take part in exciting multiplayer modes such as team-based Zombie Waves, team-vs-team, deathmatch, Gangheim (a mode where each kill gives you a new weapon) and more. Each mode emphasizes strategic thinking and high-speed action.

Zombie Waves: Team up with friends or survive alone in Zombie Waves, where players must survive waves of zombies. Earn rewards for each surviving wave and use a wide variety of weapons and equipment to fend off the mob.

Diverse Environments: Explore different battlefields from war-torn cityscapes to wild natural areas conquered by nature and deserts. Each map offers unique tactical opportunities and challenges.

Personalization Customize your characters with a large selection of weapons, equipment and cosmetic items. Experiment with different weapons to suit your play style and strategy.

Strategic team play: Coordinate with your friends using voice chat and tactical communication tools to outsmart your opponents and achieve victory in team modes.

Immersive Sound and Graphics: A hellish atmosphere with breathtaking visuals and dynamic sound effects that bring the chaotic battlefield to life.

Broken War combines the addictive gameplay of classic shooters with innovative multiplayer modes and waves of zombie attacks, promising an intense experience for players willing to test their skills in both cooperative and competitive scenarios.
